data.name: Wakatami Village
data.detailed_description:
From the creator of The Elysian Field comes Wakatami Village a first person Horror exploration game. The story centres around a singular character who has been sheltered his entire life but now must walk the world he must now face after the passing of his mother. Players will take control of this character and discover a post apocalyptic world. The journey will take players to discover Wakatami Village where they will see the remnants of a village and explore what occurred while escaping enemies and solving puzzles. Players can discover optional secrets and view the stories of characters in the world through notes and letters.

Key Features:

1) Melee and gunplay

2) Multiple enemies types

3) Around 30 minutes of gameplay

4) Original music

5) Light puzzles

6) 3 unique environments

7) Secrets

data.short_description: A stylized, first person horror game focusing on discovery and combat. Centred around the story of a child on his path to discover the post apocalyptic world he had been sheltered from his whole life. Discover optional stories and secrets in an unforgiving hostile world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2+
  • Processor: 2.4GHz CPU Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 750 / Radeon R7 260X with 1GB Memory
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains violent combat (gun play and melee combat) and themes of suicide which some may find distressing or unpleasant.
